name: rexabsle2
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))

stmt.origin: rexabsle(s0, s1, s0, s0, c0, c1, w0)
stmt.pretty: rexabsle(s0, s1, s0, s0, c0, c1, w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffss(s1, s0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

|- wi(w0, wb(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, c1), cle, cv(s0)))), wa(wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c1)

comment: An indexed set of absolute values of real numbers is bounded if and only if the original values are bounded above and below. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 23-Oct-2021.)
